name: Alchemist
descriptor: Earns extra gold from unit kills and bounty runes.

name: Slark
descriptor: Slips in and out of skirmishes.

name: Shadow Fiend
descriptor: Unleashes the souls of fallen enemies for damage.

name: Templar Assassin
descriptor: Slows down enemies with traps.

name: Riki
descriptor: Remains permanently invisible until the moment to strike.

name: Spectre
descriptor: Haunts her enemies and teleports to her target.

name: Troll Warlord
descriptor: Swaps between ranged and melee attacks at will.

name: Ursa
descriptor: Deals more damage with every hit to the same foe.

name: Sniper
descriptor: Picks off his enemies from afar.

name: Viper
descriptor: Poisonous toxins chip away armor and slow enemies.

name: Terrorblade
descriptor: Transforms into a powerful ranged demon.

name: Phantom Lancer
descriptor: Creates illusions of himself to trick or attack foes.

name: Razor
descriptor: Steals enemy damage to add to his own.

name: Void Spirit
descriptor: Steps in and out of the mortal plane to strike his foes.

name: Phantom Assassin
descriptor: Blinks onto her foes with critical strikes.

name: Naga Siren
descriptor: Able to captivate and disable enemies with her song.

name: Morphling
descriptor: Rides the waves to flank enemies.

name: Windranger
descriptor: Fires swift flurry of arrows at a single target

name: Winter Wyvern
descriptor: Able to force her enemies to attack their own ally

name: Visage
descriptor: Scouts and attacks with his familiars.

name: Venomancer
descriptor: Deals damage over time with venomous attacks.

name: Vengeful Spirit
descriptor: Can swap herself with any nearby hero.

name: Timbersaw
descriptor: Chops through the forest to face his foes.

name: Snapfire
descriptor: Mows down her enemies with heavy artillery and her trusty lizard.

name: Techies
descriptor: Surprises enemies with invisible landmines and explosive attacks.

name: Sand King
descriptor: Burrows to stun and slow enemies.

name: Phoenix
descriptor: Heals and damages at the sacrifice of its own health.

name: Pangolier
descriptor: Dashes and rolls in to disrupt enemy movements.

name: Mirana
descriptor: Stuns enemies with precise arrows from afar.

name: Nyx Assassin
descriptor: Reflects enemy damage and stuns.

name: Lycan
descriptor: Shapeshifts into a ferocious beast.

name: Magnus
descriptor: Charges in to reposition his enemies.

name: Marci
descriptor: Dashes around pummeling enemies with rapid attacks.

name: Io
descriptor: Links to its allies to buff them.

name: Lone Druid
descriptor: Commands a powerful spirit bear in battle.

name: Dazzle
descriptor: Powerful healer who can briefly prevent death.

name: Enigma
descriptor: Traps and damages enemies in a black hole.

name: Invoker
descriptor: Weaves magic with an array of spell combos.

name: Dark Willow
descriptor: Has an arsenal of disables at her disposal.

name: Clockwerk
descriptor: Launches himself into enemies with his hookshot.

name: Dark Seer
descriptor: Pulls and manipulates his enemies' positions.

name: Broodmother
descriptor: Hunts with her army of Spiderlings.

name: Brewmaster
descriptor: Splits into elemental spirits with unique abilities.

name: Chen
descriptor: Converts creeps to his cause, building an army.

name: Beastmaster
descriptor: Summons beasts to aid his hunt.

name: Batrider
descriptor: Can lasso an enemy away from his team.

name: Zeus
descriptor: Strikes enemies near and far with lightning.

name: Abaddon
descriptor: Shields his allies or himself from attacks.

name: Witch Doctor
descriptor: Channels a high damage death ward.

name: Bane
descriptor: Puts his enemies to sleep, incapacitating them.

name: Warlock
descriptor: Summons powerful demons to fight at his side.

name: Tinker
descriptor: Demolishes his enemies with modern technology.

name: Skywrath Mage
descriptor: Casts high damage magical spells on a single target.

name: Storm Spirit
descriptor: Zips across the map to engage in fights.

name: Shadow Shaman
descriptor: Summons powerful serpent wards to deal damage.

name: Silencer
descriptor: Can silence all enemies on the map.

name: Shadow Demon
descriptor: Stacks exponential poison damage against his foes.

name: Puck
descriptor: Orbs to enemies and silences them.

name: Pugna
descriptor: Drains enemy life to heal himself.

name: Nature's Prophet
descriptor: Able to teleport to any location on the map at will.

name: Outworld Destroyer
descriptor: Can imprison a hero, making them invulnerable.

name: Rubick
descriptor: Steals the spells of his enemies to use against them.

name: Queen of Pain
descriptor: Blinks in to deal massive magical damage.

name: Necrophos
descriptor: Damages enemies and heals allies simultaneously.

name: Oracle
descriptor: Alters the fates of heroes with his buffs and nukes.

name: Muerta
descriptor: Blasts fearsome trickshots and unleashes ethereal ruin.

name: Lion
descriptor: Steals enemy mana to fuel his own abilities.

name: Leshrac
descriptor: Can deal heavy damage in an aura around himself.

name: Jakiro
descriptor: Freezes and burns enemies with magic.

name: Keeper of the Light
descriptor: Provides instant mana to allies.

name: Lina
descriptor: Increases attack and speed with every spell.

name: Lich
descriptor: Unleashes a powerful attack that bounces between enemies.

name: Enchantress
descriptor: Enchants neutral creeps to do her bidding.

name: Grimstroke
descriptor: Disables enemies with a swipe of his brush.

name: Disruptor
descriptor: Traps and silences foes in his static storm.

name: Crystal Maiden
descriptor: Unleashes a high damage blizzard upon her foes.

name: Monkey King
descriptor: Springs from the cover of the tree tops.

name: Weaver
descriptor: Rewinds time to reverse damage and position.

name: Death Prophet
descriptor: Summons an army of ghosts to attack.

name: Ancient Apparition
descriptor: Launches a powerful icy blast from anywhere on the map.

name: Medusa
descriptor: Immobilizes her enemies with her stone gaze.

name: Meepo
descriptor: Five are stronger than one.

name: Luna
descriptor: Tears into her enemies with bouncing attacks.

name: Clinkz
descriptor: Stalks invisibly to ambush lone enemies.

name: Juggernaut
descriptor: Slices through his enemies with precise strikes.

name: Faceless Void
descriptor: Can freeze his enemies in time.

name: Hoodwink
descriptor: Shackles her enemies to trees.

name: Drow Ranger
descriptor: Slows with her frost-tipped arrows

name: Ember Spirit
descriptor: Rapidly strikes and chains his foes.

name: Gyrocopter
descriptor: Barrages with his cannon and homing missiles.

name: Bounty Hunter
descriptor: Loots and collects bounties off of his enemies.

name: Bloodseeker
descriptor: Chases down low health enemies with increased speed.

name: Arc Warden
descriptor: Creates a copy of himself to split push.

name: Wraith King
descriptor: Can reincarnate instantly upon death.

name: Undying
descriptor: Summons hordes of zombies to attack his foes.

name: Anti-Mage
descriptor: Slashes his foes with mana-draining attacks.

name: Treant Protector
descriptor: Calls upon the forest to root his foes.

name: Underlord
descriptor: Teleports his team in and out of battle.

name: Tiny
descriptor: Grows in size and strength as battle ensues.

name: Tusk
descriptor: Snowballs into his enemies to stun.

name: Tidehunter
descriptor: Durable hero who shrugs off enemy damage.

name: Sven
descriptor: Cleaves down enemies with his incredible strength.

name: Spirit Breaker
descriptor: Charges down enemies from anywhere on the map.

name: Omniknight
descriptor: Tanky frontliner who protects and heals his allies.

name: Slardar
descriptor: Chases down his enemies to weaken and bash them.

name: Night Stalker
descriptor: Empowered by the shadows of nightfall.

name: Pudge
descriptor: Hooks and pulls enemies towards him.

name: Ogre Magi
descriptor: Uses a touch of luck to amplify his skills.

name: Primal Beast
descriptor: Stomps over everything and smashes enemies into messy bits.

name: Legion Commander
descriptor: Increases power with each duel victory.

name: Mars
descriptor: Traps his foes in an inescapable arena.

name: Kunkka
descriptor: Disrupts enemy positioning and disables them.

name: Huskar
descriptor: Sacrifices his health to deal more damage.

name: Elder Titan
descriptor: Damages and disables with his Astral Spirit.

name: Lifestealer
descriptor: Infests other units for mobility and strength.

name: Earth Spirit
descriptor: Disables and repositions his enemies.

name: Earthshaker
descriptor: Disrupts enemy team with his chain stuns.

name: Dragon Knight
descriptor: Transforms into a formidable ranged dragon.

name: Bristleback
descriptor: Takes reduced damage when facing away from enemies.

name: Doom
descriptor: Can prevent a single enemy from using abilities and healing.

name: Dawnbreaker
descriptor: Leaps to aid her allies, wherever they are on the map.

name: Chaos Knight
descriptor: Has strong but random damage output.

name: Centaur Warrunner
descriptor: Reflects damage back to his attackers.

name: Axe
descriptor: Taunts and forces enemies to attack him.
